NO_ALTING: <:pinkdot:877822071244206120> You are only allowed to use **1** singular account to play and engage with Sofi
NO_HELPING_ALTERS: <:pinkdot:877822071244206120> Do not support or interadct with alters and scammers. If you have suspicions about a user, please report them to staff
NO_EXPLOITING_BUGS: <:pinkdot:877822071244206120> Should you come across a bug or exploit, report them immediately. Abusing them will be punished
NO_FARMING: <:pinkdot:877822071244206120> You must not use your social media standing to gain any resources or cards on Sofi
NO_SCAMMING: <:pinkdot:877822071244206120> Do not try to scam other users
NO_SELFBOT: <:pinkdot:877822071244206120> The use of macros and bots to gain an advantage is strictly prohibited
